languages.text: "...правопреемником Теодоры фон Валанциус становится {name} — законн{mf|ый|ая} наследни{mf|к|ца} Торгового Патента и звания Вольного Торговца. Официальная церемония возвышения будет проведена позже, а пока..." {n}Абеляр осекается и смотрит на растерявшихся офицеров.{/n} "Языки проглотили? Приветствуйте сво{mf|его|ю} влады{mf|ку|чицу} — {mf|его|ее} чаяниями мы все с вами все еще живы!"

traits.locale_text: "...правопреемником Теодоры фон Валанциус становится {name} фон Валанциус — законн{mf|ый|ая} наследни{mf|к|ца} Торгового Патента и звания Вольного Торговца. Официальная церемония возвышения будет проведена позже, а пока..." {n}Абеляр осекается и смотрит на растерявшихся офицеров.{/n} "Языки проглотили? Приветствуйте сво{mf|его|ю} влады{mf|ку|чицу} — {mf|его|ее} чаяниями мы все с вами все еще живы!"

languages.text: "...it is hereby declared that the successor to Theodora von Valancius is {name}, the rightful inheritor of the Warrant of Trade and the title of Rogue Trader. The official ascension ceremony will be held at a later time. In the interim..." {n}Abelard stops short and glares fiercely at the confused officers.{/n} "Have you lost your tongues? Hail your {mf|lord|lady} — it is because of {mf|his|her} toils that we all still live!"
languages.original_text: "...правопреемником Теодоры фон Валанциус становится {name} — законн{mf|ый|ая} наследни{mf|к|ца} Торгового Патента и звания Вольного Торговца. Официальная церемония возвышения будет проведена позже, а пока..." {n}Абеляр осекается и смотрит на растерявшихся офицеров.{/n} "Языки проглотили? Приветствуйте сво{mf|его|ю} влады{mf|ку|чицу} — {mf|его|ее} чаяниями мы все с вами все еще живы!"

traits.locale_text: "...it is hereby declared that the successor to Theodora von Valancius is {name} von Valancius, the rightful inheritor of the Warrant of Trade and the title of Rogue Trader. The official ascension ceremony will be held at a later time. In the interim..." {n}Abelard stops short and glares fiercely at the confused officers.{/n} "Have you lost your tongues? Hail your {mf|lord|lady} — it is because of {mf|his|her} toils that we all still live!"

"...it is hereby declared that the successor to Theodora von Valancius is {name}, the rightful inheritor of the Warrant of Trade and the title of Rogue Trader. The official ascension ceremony will be held at a later time. In the interim..." {n}Abelard stops short and glares fiercely at the confused officers.{/n} "Have you lost your tongues? Hail your {mf|lord|lady} — it is because of {mf|his|her} toils that we all still live!"

languages.text: “……我特此宣布，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的合法继承人，{name}，将成为贸易授状的新任主人，继承行商浪人这一称号。正式的登基仪式将于稍后举行。而在此期间……”{n}阿贝拉德停了下来，怒不可遏地瞪着那些目瞪口呆的军官。{/n}“你们是哑了吗？向你们的领主舰长致敬！正是由于{mf|他|她}的不懈奋战，我们才能活命！”
languages.original_text: "...it is hereby declared that the successor to Theodora von Valancius is {name}, the rightful inheritor of the Warrant of Trade and the title of Rogue Trader. The official ascension ceremony will be held at a later time. In the interim..." {n}Abelard stops short and glares fiercely at the confused officers.{/n} "Have you lost your tongues? Hail your {mf|lord|lady} — it is because of {mf|his|her} toils that we all still live!"

traits.locale_text: “……我特此宣布，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的合法继承人，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，将成为贸易许可证的新任主人，继承行商浪人这一称号。正式的登基仪式将于稍后举行。而在此期间……”{n}阿贝拉德停了下来，怒不可遏地瞪着那些目瞪口呆的军官。{/n}“你们是哑了吗？向你们的领主舰长致敬！正是由于{mf|他|她}的不懈奋战，我们才能活命！”

languages.text: «... por la presente, queda declarado que {mf|el|la} sucesor{mf||a} de Theodora von Valancius es {name}, hereder{mf|o|a} de pleno derecho a la Patente de Comercio y el título de Comerciante Independiente. La ceremonia de ascensión oficial se celebrará más adelante. Mientras tanto...». {n}Abelard hace una pausa y lanza una mirada fiera a los oficiales confusos.{/n} «¿Se han quedado todos mudos? ¡Aclamen a su señor{mf||a}! ¡Han sido sus esfuerzos los que nos han permitido seguir con vida!».
languages.original_text: "...it is hereby declared that the successor to Theodora von Valancius is {name}, the rightful inheritor of the Warrant of Trade and the title of Rogue Trader. The official ascension ceremony will be held at a later time. In the interim..." {n}Abelard stops short and glares fiercely at the confused officers.{/n} "Have you lost your tongues? Hail your {mf|lord|lady} — it is because of {mf|his|her} toils that we all still live!"

traits.locale_text: «... por la presente, queda declarado que {mf|el|la} sucesor{mf||a} de Theodora von Valancius es {name} von Valancius, hereder{mf|o|a} de pleno derecho a la Patente de Comercio y el título de Comerciante Independiente. La ceremonia de ascensión oficial se celebrará más adelante. Mientras tanto...». {n}Abelard hace una pausa y lanza una mirada fiera a los oficiales confusos.{/n} «¿Se han quedado todos mudos? ¡Aclamen a su señor{mf|o|a}! ¡Han sido sus esfuerzos los que nos han permitido seguir con vida!».

languages.text: 「…シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス様の後継者は、通商許可証と自由開拓者の称号の正当な継承者である{name}様にあられることをここに宣言する。正式な即位式は後日開催される。それまでの間…」{n}アベラルドは止まり、混乱した士官たちを厳しく睨みつけた。{/n}「どうしてそんなに静かなのだ？{mf|ロード|レディ}を讃えよ！我らが今も生きていられるのは{mf|ロード|レディ}の労苦のおかげです！」
languages.original_text: "...it is hereby declared that the successor to Theodora von Valancius is {name}, the rightful inheritor of the Warrant of Trade and the title of Rogue Trader. The official ascension ceremony will be held at a later time. In the interim..." {n}Abelard stops short and glares fiercely at the confused officers.{/n} "Have you lost your tongues? Hail your {mf|lord|lady} — it is because of {mf|his|her} toils that we all still live!"

traits.locale_text: 「…テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの後継者は、貿易令状とローグトレーダーの称号の正当な継承者である{name}フォン・バランシウスにあられることをここに宣言する。正式な即位式は後日開催される。それまでの間…」{n} アベラルドは止まり、混乱した士官たちを厳しく睨みつけた。{/n}「舌を失ってしまったのですか？皇帝万歳！ —私たちが今も生きているのは皇帝の労苦のおかげです！」

「…シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス様の後継者は、通商許可証と自由開拓者の称号の正当な継承者である{name}様にあられることをここに宣言する。正式な即位式は後日開催される。それまでの間…」{n}アベラルドは止まり、混乱した士官たちを厳しく睨みつけた。{/n}「どうしてそんなに静かなのだ？{mf|ロード|レディ}を讃えよ！我らが今も生きていられるのは{mf|ロード|レディ}の労苦のおかげです！」

languages.original_text: "...it is hereby declared that the successor to Theodora von Valancius is  von Valancius, the rightful inheritor of the Warrant of Trade and the title of Rogue Trader. The official ascension ceremony will be held at a later time. In the interim..." {n}Abelard stops short and glares fiercely at the confused officers.{/n} "Have you lost your tongues? Hail your {mf|lord|lady} — it is because of {mf|his|her} toils that we all still live!"

languages.text: « ... je nomme donc à la succession de Théodora von Valancius {name}, ici {mf|présent|présente}, qui hérite ainsi de sa lettre de marque et du titre de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. La cérémonie d'ascension officielle aura lieu à une date ultérieure. En attendant... » {n}Abélard s'interrompt et lance un regard désapprobateur aux officiers à l'air perplexe.{/n} « Eh bien, vous avez perdu votre langue ? Acclamez votre {mf|seigneur|dame} ; c'est grâce à ses efforts que nous sommes tous encore en vie ! »
languages.original_text: "...it is hereby declared that the successor to Theodora von Valancius is {name}, the rightful inheritor of the Warrant of Trade and the title of Rogue Trader. The official ascension ceremony will be held at a later time. In the interim..." {n}Abelard stops short and glares fiercely at the confused officers.{/n} "Have you lost your tongues? Hail your {mf|lord|lady} — it is because of {mf|his|her} toils that we all still live!"

traits.locale_text: « ... je nomme donc à la succession de Théodora von Valancius {name} von Valancius, ici {mf|présent|présente}, qui hérite ainsi de sa lettre de marque et du titre de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. La cérémonie d'ascension officielle aura lieu à une date ultérieure. En attendant... » {n}Abélard s'interrompt et lance un regard désapprobateur aux officiers à l'air perdu.{/n} « Eh bien, vous avez perdu votre langue ? Acclamez votre {mf|seigneur|dame} ; c'est grâce à ses efforts que nous sommes tous encore en vie ! »

languages.text: "... sei hiermit verkündet, dass die Nachfolge von Theodora von Valancius angetreten wird von {name}, {mf|dem rechtmäßigen Erben|der rechtmäßigen Erbin} des Handelsbriefs und des Titels {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin}. Die offizielle Aufstiegszeremonie wird zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt abgehalten. Bis dahin ..." {n}Abelard hält inne und wirft den verwirrten Offizieren einen wilden Blick zu.{/n} "Habt Ihr Eure Zungen verloren? Lobpreist {mf|Euren Lord – ihm|Eure Lady – ihr} habt Ihr es zu verdanken, dass wir noch am Leben sind!"
languages.original_text: "...it is hereby declared that the successor to Theodora von Valancius is {name}, the rightful inheritor of the Warrant of Trade and the title of Rogue Trader. The official ascension ceremony will be held at a later time. In the interim..." {n}Abelard stops short and glares fiercely at the confused officers.{/n} "Have you lost your tongues? Hail your {mf|lord|lady} — it is because of {mf|his|her} toils that we all still live!"

traits.locale_text: "... sei hiermit verkündet, dass die Nachfolge von Theodora von Valancius angetreten wird von {name}, {mf|dem rechtmäßigen Erben|der rechtmäßigen Erbin} des Handelsbriefs und des Titels {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Die offizielle Aufstiegszeremonie wird zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt abgehalten. Bis dahin ..." {n}Abelard hält inne und wirft den verwirrten Offizieren einen wilden Blick zu.{/n} "Habt Ihr Eure Zungen verloren? Lobpreist {mf|Euren Lord – ihm|Eure Lady – ihr} habt Ihr es zu verdanken, dass wir noch am Leben sind!"

languages.text: "Theodora von Valancius'un halefinin, Hür Tacir ünvanı ve Ticari Ruhsatname'nin meşru vârisinin {name} olduğunu ilan ederim. Resmî tören ileri bir tarihte yapılacaktır. Bu zaman zarfında..." {n}Abelard, kısa süreliğine duraklıyor ve kafası karışmış subaylara öfkeli bir bakış fırlatıyor.{/n} "Dilinizi mi yuttunuz? {mf|Lordunuzu|Leydinizi} selamlayın! Hâlâ hayatta oluşumuzu onun çabalarına borçluyuz!"
languages.original_text: "...it is hereby declared that the successor to Theodora von Valancius is {name}, the rightful inheritor of the Warrant of Trade and the title of Rogue Trader. The official ascension ceremony will be held at a later time. In the interim..." {n}Abelard stops short and glares fiercely at the confused officers.{/n} "Have you lost your tongues? Hail your {mf|lord|lady} — it is because of {mf|his|her} toils that we all still live!"

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius'un halefinin, Hür Tacir ünvanı ve Ticari Ruhsatname'nin meşru vârisinin {name} olduğunu ilan ederim. Resmî tören ileri bir tarihte yapılacaktır. Bu zaman zarfında..." {n}Abelard, kısa süreliğine duraklıyor ve kafası karışmış subaylara öfkeli bir bakış fırlatıyor.{/n} "Dilinizi mi yuttunuz? {mf|Lordunuzu|Leydinizi} selamlayın! Hâlâ hayatta oluşumuzu onun çabalarına borçluyuz!"
